sn3.20:1.1: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo diva divassa yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamantam nisinnam kho rajanam pasenadim kosalam bhagava etadavoca:
sn3.20:1.2: “handa kuto nu tvam, maharaja, agacchasi diva divassa”ti?
sn3.20:2.2: Tamaham aputtakam sapateyyam rajantepuram atiharitva agacchami.
sn3.20:2.3: Satam, bhante, satasahassani hirannasseva, ko pana vado rupiyassa.
sn3.20:2.4: Tassa kho pana, bhante, setthissa gahapatissa evarupo bhattabhogo ahosi—
sn3.20:3.2: Bhutapubbam so, maharaja, setthi gahapati taggarasikhim nama paccekasambuddham pindapatena patipadesi.
sn3.20:3.4: Datva ca pana paccha vippatisari ahosi:
sn3.20:3.5: ‘varametam pindapatam dasa va kammakara va bhunjeyyun’ti.
sn3.20:3.6: Bhatu ca pana ekaputtakam sapateyyassa karana jivita voropesi.
sn3.20:4.1: Yam kho so, maharaja, setthi gahapati taggarasikhim paccekasambuddham pindapatena patipadesi, tassa kammassa vipakena sattakkhattum sugatim saggam lokam upapajji.
sn3.20:4.2: Tasseva kammassa vipakavasesena imissayeva savatthiya sattakkhattum setthittam karesi.
sn3.20:4.3: Yam kho so, maharaja, setthi gahapati datva paccha vippatisari ahosi:
sn3.20:4.4: ‘varametam pindapatam dasa va kammakara va bhunjeyyun’ti, tassa kammassa vipakena nassularaya bhattabhogaya cittam namati, nassularaya vatthabhogaya cittam namati, nassularaya yanabhogaya cittam namati, nassularanam pancannam kamagunanam bhogaya cittam namati.
sn3.20:4.5: Yam kho so, maharaja, setthi gahapati bhatu ca pana ekaputtakam sapateyyassa karana jivita voropesi, tassa kammassa vipakena bahuni vassani bahuni vassasatani bahuni vassasahassani bahuni vassasatasahassani niraye paccittha.
sn3.20:4.6: Tasseva kammassa vipakavasesena idam sattamam aputtakam sapateyyam rajakosam paveseti.
sn3.20:4.7: Tassa kho, maharaja, setthissa gahapatissa purananca punnam parikkhinam, navanca punnam anupacitam.
sn3.20:4.8: Ajja pana, maharaja, setthi gahapati maharoruve niraye paccati”ti.
sn3.20:4.9: “Evam, bhante, setthi gahapati maharoruvam nirayam upapanno”ti.
sn3.20:4.10: “Evam, maharaja, setthi gahapati maharoruvam nirayam upapanno”ti.
